meta.name: description
meta.content: Arizona Autism Charter School (AZACS) is the first tuition-free, public charter school in Arizona focused on the educational needs of children with autism. AZACS was unanimously approved by the Arizona State Board for Charter Schools and is currently open serving grades K-8 in Metro Phoenix.

div.strong: Open enrollment for the 2020 - 2021 school year is continuing through required school closure! Go to the Enrollment Tab to fill out an Enrollment Interest Form to have the best chance at securing a spot at Arizona's ONLY tuition-free autism focused charter school!

section.aside: Click for more videos video 1 video 2

h1.a: GOVERNOR DECLARES MANDATORY SCHOOL CLOSURES UNTIL THE END OF THE 2019-2020 SCHOOL YEAR DUE TO COVID-19

article.div: Governor Doug Ducey announced that the state of Arizona along with the Arizona Department of Education are requiring school closures in an effort to protect students from the COVID-19 virus, also known as the Corona virus. AZACS' physical sites will be closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year due to this state mandate. Teachers and staff will continue supporting students and families through remote learning opportunities. The school is continuing enrollment efforts for students seeking enrollment in the 2020-2021 school year. Please go the Enrollment Tab and fill out an Enrollment Interest Form and a member of our team will reach out or call us at (602) 883-7500. Please stay tuned to our website and emails for further updates as this is a very fluid situation. Click on the headline above to read the Governor's full notice on this required school closure. Please stay safe during this time and reach out to the leadership team with any questions. We love and miss our students and implore everyone to stay safe.

h1.a: Our Tax Credit Campaign is Here!

article.div:
Click on the maroon "DONATE ♥" button on our homepage to support AZACS through your tax credit donation. Campaign runs until Dec. 31!
Need more info? Click "Read full story" → → → → → → ↓

The December E-Newsletter is now available! The November AZACS E-Newsletter is now available! In this edition, students showcase their art projects in celebration of Thanksgiving, view staff spotlights, and you can watch our students help promote our Tax Credit Campaign. These stories and more!

The November AZACS E-Newsletter is now available! In this edition, students showcase their art projects in celebration of Thanksgiving, view staff spotlights, and you can watch our students help promote our Tax Credit Campaign. These stories and more!
In this edition, we share important upcoming events like the Fall Festival and Autism Speaks/SARRC Walk, highlight AZACS staff and students...and more!

div.br:
Average salary of all teachers employed in the budget year 2020: $42,898
Average salary of all teachers employed in the prior year 2019: $41,160
Increase in average teacher salary from prior year 2019: $1,738
Percentage increase: 4.2%
Average salary of all teachers employed in FY2018: $38,321

div.strong: Total percentage increase in average teacher salary since FY2018: 11.9%

div.div: For more information on our budget or teacher salaries see our posted budgets in the link below

Arizona Autism Charter School (AZACS) is the first tuition-free, public charter school in Arizona focused on the educational needs of children with autism. In 2013, AZACS was unanimously approved by the Arizona State Board for Charter Schools (ASBCS) as a K-5 school in Metro Phoenix.
In 2016, after presenting exemplary student growth data, the ASBCS approved AZACS to extend to grades 6-8!

AZACS grew yet again in 2017 when the state board approved the school to expand to 12th grade, making Arizona Autism Charter School the ONLY K-12 charter school in our state focused on children with autism. AZACS is growing its High School by one grade level each year, offering grades K-11 in the 2020 - 2021 school year, and going to 12th grade in the 2021 - 2022 school year.

div.h1: We Are The First Tuition-Free, Autism-Focused Public Charter School To Be:

article.p: AZACS is the first tuition-free, autism-focused public charter school in the western United States (NCSECS.org)
AZACS is the first tuition-free, autism-focused public charter school in Arizona

article.h1: First to expand to K-12 levels
article.p: AZACS received state approval for expansion based on demonstration of student growth
AZACS has data-driven instruction supervised by Board Certified Behavior Analysts (BCBAs)
AZACS is a proud recipients of prestigious start-up grants from the Walton Family Foundation and the AZ Charter Schools Program
AZACS is part of an elite group of schools recognized for excellence by New Schools for Phoenix and A for Arizona
